title: Tata Power acquires Bikaner-Neemrana Transmission Project
description: The company received the letter of intent (LOI) after emerging as a successful bidder in the Tariff-Based Competitive Bidding (TBCB) process, as per the guidelines issued by Ministry of Power, it added.
